games.spiders

Class BroodMother

  • java.lang.Object
    • joueur.BaseGameObject
      • games.spiders.GameObject
        • games.spiders.Spider
          • games.spiders.BroodMother

  • public class BroodMother
extends Spider
    The Spider Queen. She alone can spawn Spiderlings for each Player, and if she dies the owner loses.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double eggs
      How many eggs the BroodMother has to spawn Spiderlings this turn.
      int health
      How much health this BroodMother has left.

      • Fields inherited from class games.spiders.Spider

        isDead, nest, owner

      • Fields inherited from class games.spiders.GameObject

        gameObjectName, logs

      • Fields inherited from class joueur.BaseGameObject

        id

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new instance of a BroodMother.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean consume(Spiderling spiderling)
      Consumes a Spiderling of the same owner to regain some eggs to spawn more Spiderlings.
      Spiderling spawn(java.lang.String spiderlingType)
      Spawns a new Spiderling on the same Nest as this BroodMother, consuming an egg.

    • Field Detail

      • eggs

        public double eggs
        How many eggs the BroodMother has to spawn Spiderlings this turn.

      • health

        public int health
        How much health this BroodMother has left. When it reaches 0, she dies and her owner loses.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BroodMother

        public BroodMother()
        Creates a new instance of a BroodMother. Used during game initialization, do not call directly.

    • Method Detail

      • consume

        public boolean consume(Spiderling spiderling)
        Consumes a Spiderling of the same owner to regain some eggs to spawn more Spiderlings.
        Parameters:
        spiderling - The Spiderling to consume. It must be on the same Nest as this BroodMother.
        Returns:
        True if the Spiderling was consumed. False otherwise.

      • spawn

        public Spiderling spawn(java.lang.String spiderlingType)
        Spawns a new Spiderling on the same Nest as this BroodMother, consuming an egg.
        Parameters:
        spiderlingType - The string name of the Spiderling class you want to Spawn. Must be 'Spitter', 'Weaver', or 'Cutter'.
        Returns:
        The newly spwaned Spiderling if successful. Null otherwise.
